verses.verse: Then we turned,<WH6437> and took our journey<WH5265> into the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870> to the Red<WH5488> Sea,<WH3220> as Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to me;<WH5437> and we encircled Mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> many<WH7227> days.<WH3117>
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to me,<WH559> saying,
"You have encircled<WH5437> this mountain<WH2022> long enough.<WH7227> Turn<WH6437> northward.<WH6828>

Command<WH6680> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> <WH5674> 'You are to pass through the border<WH1366> of your brothers<WH251> the children<WH1121> of Esau,<WH6215> who dwell<WH3427> in Seir;<WH8165> and they will be afraid<WH3372> of you:<WH3966> take good heed to yourselves therefore;<WH8104>

don't<WH1624> contend with them;<WH5414> for I will not give you of their land,<WH776> no,<WH4096> not so much as for the sole of the foot<WH7272> to tread on;<WH5414> because I have given Mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> to Esau<WH6215> for a possession.<WH3425>
You shall purchase<WH7666> food<WH400> of them for money,<WH3701> that you may eat;<WH398> and you shall also buy<WH3739> water<WH4325> of them for money,<WH3701> that you may drink.<WH8354>'"

For Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has blessed<WH1288> you in all the work<WH4639> of your hand;<WH3027> he has known<WH3045> your walking<WH3212> through this great<WH1419> wilderness:<WH4057> these forty<WH705> years<WH8141> Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has been with you;<WH2637> you have lacked nothing.<WH1697>

So we passed<WH5674> by from our brothers<WH251> the children<WH1121> of Esau,<WH6215> who dwell<WH3427> in Seir,<WH8165> from the way<WH1870> of the Arabah<WH6160> from Elath<WH359> and from Ezion Geber.<WH6100> We turned<WH6437> and passed<WH5674> by the way<WH1870> of the wilderness<WH4057> of Moab.<WH4124>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH6696> "Don't bother Moab,<WH4124> neither contend<WH1624> with them in battle;<WH4421> for I will not give<WH5414> you of his land<WH776> for a possession;<WH3425> because I have given<WH5414> Ar<WH6144> to the children<WH1121> of Lot<WH3876> for a possession.<WH3425>"
(The Emim<WH368> lived<WH3427> therein before,<WH6440> a people<WH5971> great,<WH1419> and many,<WH7227> and tall,<WH7311> as the Anakim:<WH6062>
these<WH1992> also are accounted<WH2803> Rephaim,<WH7497> as the Anakim;<WH6062> but the Moabites<WH4125> call<WH7121> them Emim.<WH368>

The Horites<WH2752> also lived<WH3427> in Seir<WH8165> before,<WH6440> but the children<WH1121> of Esau<WH6215> succeeded<WH3423> them;<WH8045> and they destroyed them from before<WH6440> them,<WH3427> and lived in their place;<WH3478> as Israel did<WH6213> to the land<WH776> of his possession,<WH3425> which Yahweh<WH3068> gave to them.<WH5414>)
"Now rise up,<WH6965> and cross over<WH5674> the brook<WH5158> Zered.<WH2218>" We went over<WH5674> the brook<WH5158> Zered.<WH2218>

The days<WH3117> in which we came<WH1980> from Kadesh Barnea,<WH6947> until we had come<WH1980> over the brook<WH5158> Zered,<WH2218> were thirty<WH7970> - eight<WH8083> years;<WH8141> until all the generation<WH1755> of the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> were consumed<WH8552> from the midst<WH7130> of the camp,<WH4264> as Yahweh<WH3068> swore to them.<WH7650>
Moreover the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh<WH3068> was against them,<WH2000> to destroy them from the midst<WH7130> of the camp,<WH4264> until they were consumed.<WH8552>
So it happened,<WH582> when all the men of war<WH4421> were consumed<WH8552> and dead<WH4191> from among<WH7130> the people,<WH5971>
that Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to me,<WH559> saying,
"You are<WH6144> this day to pass over<WH5674> Ar,<WH6144> the border<WH1366> of Moab:<WH4124>

and when you come near<WH7126> over against<WH4136> the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> don't<WH6696> bother them,<WH1624> nor contend with them;<WH5414> for I will not give you of the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> for a possession;<WH3425> because I have given<WH5414> it to the children<WH1121> of Lot<WH3876> for a possession.<WH3425>"
(That also is accounted<WH2803> a land<WH776> of Rephaim:<WH7497> Rephaim<WH7497> lived<WH3427> therein before;<WH6440> but the Ammonites<WH5984> call<WH7121> them Zamzummim,<WH2157>

a people<WH5971> great,<WH1419> and many,<WH7227> and tall,<WH7311> as the Anakim;<WH6062> but Yahweh<WH3068> destroyed<WH8045> them before<WH6440> them;<WH3423> and they succeeded them,<WH3427> and lived in their place;

as he did<WH6213> for the children<WH1121> of Esau,<WH6215> who dwell<WH3427> in Seir,<WH8165> when he destroyed<WH8045> the Horites<WH2752> from before<WH6440> them;<WH3423> and they succeeded them,<WH3427> and lived in their place even to this day:<WH3117>

and the Avvim,<WH5761> who lived<WH3427> in villages<WH2699> as far as Gaza,<WH5804> the Caphtorim,<WH3732> who came forth<WH3318> out of Caphtor,<WH3731> destroyed<WH8045> them,<WH3427> and lived in their place.)

"Rise up,<WH6965> take your journey,<WH5265> and pass over<WH5674> the valley<WH5158> of the Arnon:<WH769> behold,<WH7200> I have given<WH5414> into your hand<WH3027> Sihon<WH5511> the Amorite,<WH567> king<WH4428> of Heshbon,<WH2809> and his land;<WH776> begin<WH2490> to possess<WH3423> it,<WH1624> and contend with him in battle.<WH4421>

This day<WH3117> will I begin<WH2490> to put<WH5414> the dread<WH6343> of you and the fear<WH3374> of you on the peoples<WH6440> who are under the whole sky,<WH8064> who shall hear<WH8085> the report<WH8088> of you,<WH7264> and shall tremble, and be in anguish<WH2342> because of you.<WH6440>"
I sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> out of the wilderness<WH4057> of Kedemoth<WH6932> to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon<WH2809> with words<WH1697> of peace,<WH7965> saying,<WH559>
"Let me pass<WH5674> through your land:<WH776> I will go<WH3212> along by the highway,<WH1870> I will turn<WH5493> neither to the right hand<WH3225> nor to the left.<WH8040>

You shall sell<WH7666> me food<WH400> for money,<WH3701> that I may eat;<WH398> and give<WH5414> me water<WH4325> for money,<WH3701> that I may drink:<WH8354> only let me pass through<WH5674> on my feet,<WH7272>

as the children<WH1121> of Esau<WH6215> who dwell<WH3427> in Seir,<WH8165> and the Moabites<WH4125> who dwell<WH3427> in Ar,<WH6144> did<WH6213> to me;<WH5674> until I shall pass over the Jordan<WH3383> into the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> gives us.<WH5414>"

But Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon<WH2809> would<WH14> not let us pass<WH5674> by him;<WH3068> for Yahweh your God<WH430> hardened<WH7185> his spirit,<WH7307> and made his heart<WH3824> obstinate,<WH553> that he might deliver<WH5414> him into your hand,<WH3027> as at this day.<WH3117>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH7200> "Behold, I have begun<WH2490> to deliver<WH5414> up Sihon<WH5511> and his land<WH776> before<WH6440> you:<WH2490> begin to possess,<WH3423> that you may inherit<WH3423> his land.<WH776>"
Then Sihon<WH5511> came out<WH3318> against<WH7125> us,<WH5971> he and all his people, to battle<WH4421> at Jahaz.<WH3096>
Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> delivered<WH5414> him up before<WH6440> us;<WH5221> and we struck him,<WH1121> and his sons, and all his people.<WH5971>

We took<WH3920> all his cities<WH5892> at that time,<WH6256> and utterly destroyed<WH2763> every inhabited<WH4962> city,<WH5892> with the women<WH802> and the little ones;<WH2945> we left<WH7604> none remaining:<WH8300>
only the livestock<WH929> we took for a prey<WH962> to ourselves,<WH7998> with the spoil of the cities<WH5892> which we had taken.<WH3920>

From Aroer,<WH6177> which is on the edge<WH8193> of the valley<WH5158> of the Arnon,<WH769> and the city<WH5892> that is in the valley,<WH5158> even to Gilead,<WH1568> there was not a city<WH7151> too high<WH7682> for us;<WH3068> Yahweh our God<WH430> delivered<WH5414> up all before us:<WH6440>

only to the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> you didn't<WH7126> come near;<WH3027> all the side of the river<WH5158> Jabbok,<WH2999> and the cities<WH5892> of the hill country,<WH2022> and wherever Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> forbade us.<WH6680>
